sourcesContent:
<template>
  <MglMap
    :accessToken="accessToken"
    :mapStyle.sync="mapStyle"
    :center="coordinates"
  >
    <MglMarker :coordinates="coordinates" color="blue" />
  </MglMap>
</template>

<script>
import { MglMap, MglMarker } from "vue-mapbox";
import { onMounted } from "vue";
// import GeoErrorModal from "../components/GeoErrorModal.vue";
export default {
  name: "HomeView",
  components: {
    MglMap,
    MglMarker
  },
  setup() {
    onMounted(() => {
    });
    return {
      coordinates: [-111.549668, 39.014],
      accessToken: "pk.eyJ1IjoiYW50b25la2luZyIsImEiOiJjbGNqdGh0cWcwMmE0M3BxanhrdHV3cWl1In0.wivLpjrKuRgzpmt3w5SmKw", // your access token. Needed if you using Mapbox maps
      mapStyle: "mapbox://styles/mapbox/basic-v10", // your map style
    };
  },
};
</script>
